summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account activity for Southern Financial LLC for the period of December 1, 2015, to December 31, 2015. It includes information on account balances, income, expenses, and securities held, as well as disclosures regarding the nature of the investments and the role of Pershing as the clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC detailing account transactions, balances, and terms related to securities and bank deposits. It includes information on dividends, interest income, and account management policies, as well as disclosures regarding tax reporting and investment advice. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to accounts managed by Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It includes details about account balances, transactions, and important disclosures regarding arbitration and bank deposits. The document emphasizes the roles of various financial institutions and the responsibilities of account holders. It includes information on account balances, transactions, and securities holdings, particularly focusing on investments in Apple Inc. and FDIC insured bank deposits. The document highlights significant financial figures and summarizes gains and losses.
